entry.title: New release for Beaver Habit Tracker: 0.4.4
entry.content:
✨ New Features:

  • Truncate habit name to avoid too long error message (#60)

  • Prevent accidentally triggering a press-and-hold event while scrolling the page. (#75)
  • Fix Docker release cache missing issue

entry.title: New release for Beaver Habit Tracker: v0.4.6
entry.content:
✨ New Features

  • NA (This release mainly focuses on enhancing app stability and performance)

💡 Enhancements

  • Made a number of accessibility improvements for wider audience #93
  • Update TTL of static files to improve page loading speeds
  • Sticky date row for long habit list #82
  • Add Docker Healthchecks #73

🐞 Bugfixes

  • Fix the white flash between page loads when using the dark mode
  • Fixed issue with login failures when using password auto-fill

entry.title: New release for Beaver Habit Tracker: v0.5.0
entry.content:
✨ New Features

  • Add support for periodic habits, e.g. two times a week or every two weeks
  • Add habit tagging and automatic sorting
  • Enabled daily backups to be sent directly to private telegram chat

💡 Enhancements

  • Set Umami analytics tracking to be disabled by default, prioritizing user privacy
  • Upgraded the Python runtime environment from version 3.12 to 3.13

🐞 Bugfixes

  • Resolved an issue affecting the import functionality
  • Fixed a problem with password autofill on the login page
